message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.AR. 

The paper deals with the estimation of spatial covariance for millimeter wave hybrid systems, which involves the use of information from both sub-6 GHz and mmWave frequencies. This suggests that the paper could belong to several arXiv CS sub-categories, including Information Theory (cs.IT), Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI), Systems and Control (cs.SY), Multimedia (cs.MM), and Architecture (cs.AR). Among these, cs.IT and cs.NI are the most likely categories, as the paper deals with wireless communication and signal processing, which are closely related to these fields. The other categories are also possible, as the paper involves the use of theoretical models and algorithms for system design and optimization.
